blocking mats tapestry crochet concepts if you have any blocking pins fabric steamer questions or concerns about this pattern notions embroidery needle scissors please reach out to me sara directly at your work before starting the next row turning chains do not count as a stitch and are not indicated on the stitch charts to follow the pattern you may use either the image chart page 3 or the color block instructions pages 5-6 color block instructions are color coded by yarn color if you would like to edit the chart with your own color scheme you may access the chart on stitch fiddle here https
